Can Indian Economy expect revival despite rising inflation? What do you think are the major steps that can be taken in present circumstances to push growth in the country?
Inflation is the term where the prices are rising up and down due to many reasons like political issues,environmental issues,social issues,demand and supply situations in the business environment.pricing for an product will depends upon the demand and supply conditions of the customers.inflation may occur due to the affecting of the other situations.price of one product will affect the price of the another product in an business environment.An every business man cannot expect the inflation because the price of one product influence the price of the another product in the economy and the businessman cannot withstand in the competitive market and cannot earn the expected profits by the firm.

The major steps that can be taken in the present circumstances to push growth in the country are:

1)firstly the problem should be identified in order to know why the inflation is occured.

2) strategic planning should be done in order to know the reasons for inflation.

3)knowing the area which is affecting the prices of the product whether the demand or supply are affecting the prices.

4)continuous market research should be done on the various pricing strategies of the economy.

5)mainly every firm need to know the pricing strategies of the products.

6)Continuous analysis should be done on the prices of the products. 

                                  In an present scenario every organisation is mainly dependending upon the customer satisfaction,needs,preferences etc.Based on the customers preferences firms are producing the goods and satisfying the customers in an better way in order to withstand in the competitive era.Demand of the product will affect the price of the product because as demand of the product increases,the price of the product automatically increases and if demand of the product decreases then the price of the product also decreases.Therefore the price of an product will depends upon the demand of the customer. 

                                  At my point of view every firm need to take measures for the inflation by taking the pricing srategies in to consideration,the demand of the customers etc.Customers are mainly depends upon the price of the product,based on the product customers are willing to purchase it.So price affects in an economy.
